title: That moment when...
body:
Your entire team picks carry champs and you being 5th pick are left as support. I don't mind supporting, but not when people disregard common sense and all build glass cannon (and feed) while I am just a tanky support trying to save all of them... but to no avail. 

People in bronze. Stop picking carries. I know you can destroy a bronze 4 ahri... i don't care, pick a champ that will help the team win, and not just focus on "muh kda"

If you can't play a damage/ap and a tank/bruiser in each role then you'd best reconsider who you play.

/rant
